The interim government announced priority for mothers of children with microcephaly in the #MinhaCasaMinhaVida program.
They present as novelty what is not, since the MCMV prioritizes, since 2011, care for families of which people with disabilities are part.
This prioritization is expressed in the guarantee of 3% of the dwellings of each development of the program for these families with persons with disabilities.
For us, all persons with disabilities, without exception, deserve the State to ensure the conditions for the exercise of all their rights.
Still more those with children with microcephaly.
It is also astounding in the advertisement that they consider the microcephalic child as a "mother problem."
Responsibility for care is everyone's: mothers, parents, families, society and the State.
Once again, the interim government creates factoids to address issues that had already been addressed by the elected government.

On behalf of the people of the United Arab Emirates, we express our sincere sympathy and solidarity with the families of the victims of the terrorist incident that struck the French city of Nice today

The madness of terrorism will unify peoples and will not terrorize them. It will strengthen our humanitarian solidarity and will not weaken it. It will consolidate the values ​​of dialogue between different religions and will not destroy them.

The United Arab Emirates today is part of a global and international movement against terror and its position against all those who want to stand in front of the desire of the peoples to live in peace, stability, safety and security.
